ShortDescription.Value: Highlights pathing routes; residents' workplaces; employees' residences and in-transit commuters; vehicle passenger destinations.

Publish.LongDescription:
Formerlly named 'Employee Tracker'
New update: * Added route-highlighting for all en-route objects to the selected objects (ex: click a building to see who and how is coming to it) * Support public transit passenger route highlighting (experimental) * Added in-game options menu to easily toggle highlighting types on/off
Features Selecting an object applies graphical highlighting to: * The route of the selected object * The routes of all objects en-route to the selected building (experimental) -- this feature is performance-intensive and optimizaztion is a work-in-progress * Destinations and routes of all passengers in a selected vehicle (car, train, bus, plane, boat, tram) * Employee residence buildings when selecting a building that contains a workplace * Household members' workplace buildings when selecting a residential building * In-transit employee commuter vehicles / pedestrians when selecting a workplace
Regarding route pathing highlight: This is still experimental. For entities whose route crosses transit types (ex: car -> pedestrian -> subway -> pedestrian), it will highlight the entire route, except for train / subway tracks (it will highlight everything before / after the track, you can see this more easily when zooming out and finding the highlighted stop)
Controls: * shift+e to deactivate/reactivate all highlighting * shift+v to deactivate/reactivate path routing highlighting
Future Planned Updates: * Highlight routes of objects traversing through, but not stopping at, a path node * Performance improvements
Other notes: * Discord username: Vexal / porkchopsnbutter
